TextLang.Text: The connection to the server timed out.
The user name or password is not correct.
Your account information for [%1] will be deleted. Do you want to continue?
This service is currently undergoing maintenance.
A server error has occurred. (HTTP Status Code: %1)
To use this feature, you must enter the following information.
Welcome to the PlayStation®Network! Sign up for a PlayStation®Network account to play online games, download game demos and more. You can sign up for the PlayStation®Network for free.
Sign up for a new PlayStation®Network account. Select this option if this is your first time using the PlayStation®Network.
Select this option if you want to use a PlayStation®Network account that you created on another PS3™ system, PSP™ system or PC.
You can also create a PlayStation®Network account on a PC. For details, visit the following website on your PC:
You can enter text more easily if you use a USB keyboard.
To create a PlayStation®Network account, you must provide the following information. (The online ID is created by the user.)
The information you enter on this page cannot be changed later. Check that you have entered the correct information before proceeding to the next screen.
Terms of Service and User Agreement / Privacy Policy
You must accept the Terms of Service / User Agreement and Privacy Policy in order to use PlayStation®Network services.
A sign-in ID (e-mail address) is an ID that is required to use the PlayStation®Network.
The e-mail address you use for the sign-in ID will not be disclosed to other users.
You cannot use an e-mail address that is already in use as a sign-in ID.
お送りするメールを受信または表示できない場合があるため、携帯電話のEメールアドレスはご利用になれません。
Please confirm that the following e-mail address is correct:
If you enter an incorrect e-mail address, you will not be able to receive important information from the PlayStation®Network. Check that you have entered the correct information.
The online ID will be publicly displayed in the PlayStation®Network. Do not use any personally identifying information for your online ID.
You cannot change your online ID after it has been created.
Your online ID is your publicly displayed name in the PlayStation®Network. It is displayed when you play online games and use other online features.
Differences Between Online ID and Sign-In ID
While the sign-in ID can be changed later, you cannot change an online ID after the account has been created.
You have almost finished creating your account.
Do you want to receive notifications about new products, special offers and other promotions?
Yes, I am interested in receiving marketing materials from Sony Computer Entertainment.
Yes, I agree to allow Sony Computer Entertainment ("SCE") to share my personal information with SCE's partners for marketing purposes.

Sony Computer Entertainment Europe Limited, our affiliates and companies that work for us, would like to keep you informed about a wide range of PlayStation® products and services, as well as offers, products and services from selected third-party companies. If you are happy to receive this information by post and email, please tick the appropriate boxes below.
Yes, I would like to receive information on PlayStation® products and services.
Yes, I would like to receive information from selected third-party companies.
Information will be sent to the following e-mail address:
Select [Confirm] to create the account with the following information. You cannot change items with an asterisk (*) after the account is created.
Congratulations! You have successfully created your account.

Please take a moment to answer questions that will help us make our products, services and communication more exciting and beneficial for you.
Do you want to fill out our questionnaire?
Do you want to change your avatar now?
An avatar is an icon that is used to represent you and is shown to all users in the PlayStation®Network. You can also change your avatar later in [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management].
Yes, I want to change my avatar now.
No, I will change it later.

Thank you, %1!
Welcome to the vast PlayStation®Network community with access to great games, demos and exclusive content. Enjoy!
%bボタンで、この画面を終了することができます。
You do not meet the eligibility requirements for creating an account.
You do not meet the eligibility requirements for creating an account. You will need a parent or legal guardian to create an account for you.
You must have an account for a parent or guardian (master account) to create an account for a child (sub account).
With a master account, you can adjust settings for use of the PlayStation®Network by associated sub accounts.

If you have not yet created a master account, select [Cancel] and create a master account first. Select [?] to see instructions on how to create a master account. If you already have a master account, proceed to the next screen.
Using a PC To Complete Sub Account Creation (Required)

After you have entered information for the master account in the next screen, a message will be sent to the e-mail address for the master account. Follow the instructions in the e-mail to create a sub account on a PC.
After creating a sub account on a PC, select [PlayStation®Network] > [Sign Up for PlayStation®Network] on your PS3™ system, and then follow the on-screen instructions.
You do not meet the eligibility requirements for creating an account.
Enter the sign-in ID (e-mail address) and password for the master account.

To create an account for your child (sub account), you must provide personal information for your child. Some PlayStation®Network services are provided by partners such as game publishers. If your child accesses such services, the personal information for your child will be disclosed to these companies. If you agree to provide the personal information for your child, select [Continue] to proceed.
We will need your billing information to perform a verification step. Your credit card will not be charged for this verification.
A message from the PlayStation®Network will be sent to the e-mail address for the master account. Follow the instructions in the e-mail to create a sub account on a PC.
Do you want to keep your billing information on file for future transactions?
Yes, please keep my billing information on file.
An e-mail message has been sent to "%1". Follow the instructions in the e-mail to continue creating the sub account on the PC.
The sub account you are creating will be associated with master account "%1".
When a sub account is used to purchase goods, funds from the master account wallet will be used to pay for the purchase.
The master account holder can set a maximum spending limit for a sub account under [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management].
The Terms of Service / User Agreement and Privacy Policy apply to the sub account.
Differences Between Master Account and Sub Account
All features available in the PlayStation®Network can be used by a master account holder. Users %1 years old or older are eligible for a master account.
A sub account is an account for a user who is underage and does not meet eligibility requirements. A sub account is associated with the parent's or guardian's account (master account).

When a sub account is used to purchase goods, funds from the master account wallet* are used to pay for the purchase. * The wallet is an online wallet that is used to purchase goods and services from the PlayStation®Store. Funds must be added to the wallet in advance using a credit card or another funding option. Only the master account holder can add funds to the wallet.
Because a sub account is managed by a master account, you must first create a master account and then create a sub account.
Only one PlayStation®Network account can be created for each User. To create a master account, you must first create a User.
1) Select [Users] > [Create New User] to create a User for the master account.
2) Log in to the PS3™ system as the newly created User.
3) Select [PlayStation®Network] > [Sign Up for PlayStation®Network], and then follow the on-screen instructions to create a master account.
You cannot use PlayStation®Network with this account. For details, visit the following website on your PC:
Your account information has been updated.
To use PlayStation®Network with the account you entered information for, you must provide additional information.
The account you entered information for does not meet the eligibility requirements for using PlayStation®Network.
Select [Confirm] to update the account with the following information. You cannot change items with an asterisk (*) after the information has been confirmed.
Please answer the security question that you selected when you created the account.
Edit your account information, including billing information, sign-in ID and your profile.
Adjust parental control settings for an associated sub account.
Redeem a PlayStation®Network Card number or promotion code.
Review your transaction history and setting changes for the PlayStation®Store.
Activate or deactivate this system or a PSP™ system.
Enter or edit your personal profile that will be publicly displayed in the PlayStation®Network.
Choose whether to receive information about PlayStation® or third-party companies.
Adjust settings for use of the PlayStation®Network by associated sub accounts.
Set to add funds automatically when using the automatic renewal service for subscription content.
Review the history of transactions made in the PlayStation®Store.
View a list of downloaded or downloadable content from the PlayStation®Store.
Activate or deactivate the PSP™ system in use.
If you want to edit name, please contact customer services. 02-6677-7771 or 080-723-7235 www.playstation.co.kr/info
The sign-in ID (e-mail address) or password is incorrect.
Select a subscription period. (Effective from the next automatic renewal period.)
The password must not be the same as your sign-in ID or online ID.
Enter the PlayStation®Network Card number or promotion code.
Use of this item is subject to the Terms of Service and any specific conditions applying to the promotion.
Thank you for using the PlayStation®Network.
Your billing information will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Enter the new sign-in ID (e-mail address).
携帯電話以外のEメールアドレスを入力してください。
* Use at least six characters consisting of both numbers and letters.
Enter the following information. The information you enter on this page will be publicly displayed in the PlayStation®Network.
If you enter an online name, it will be displayed as your name instead of your online ID. (Some software titles do not have this option.)
Adjust parental control settings for this sub account.
Messages and chat invitations can be received by the sub account even if [Block] is selected.
Set the amount of funds that can be spent using this sub account.
If you set this option to [On], the system will require the password at the time of purchase.
This setting is valid for your account (master account) only.
If you set this option to [On], funds will be automatically added to the wallet using the credit card for the account when the wallet does not have enough funds to renew the subscription.
Specify the time period to be displayed.
Automatic renewal has been cancelled. (The service will remain available for use until it expires.)

Some types of content that are available in the PlayStation®Store can only be used on a limited number of systems per account. The number of systems that can be used depends on the type of content. You can manage the systems on which you use the content by activating and deactivating systems.
Select the type of content you want to use.
Before selecting this option, connect the PSP™ system using a USB cable, and then select [USB Connection] under [Settings] on the PSP™ system.
This service is not available in your country/region.
Adjust settings for features in Facebook. These features are available only for users who have Facebook accounts.
If you set this option to [On], information about trophies you have earned will be displayed on Facebook. Stories about trophies you have earned will be published to Facebook without prompting.

If you set this option to [On], you can share information on Facebook about items you have purchased in PlayStation®Store. You can choose to share or not share this information each time you make a purchase.
If you set this option to [On], information about your game events will be displayed on Facebook. This option is available only for games that support Facebook.
Deletes Facebook account information that is saved on this system.
This account has already been associated with a different user on this system. Use a different account to register.

The maximum number of PlayStation®Network accounts that can be associated with this system has been reached.
Contact technical support for assistance.
The sign-in ID (e-mail address) is not valid.
When creating a password, note the following:
The password must contain at least six characters.
The password must contain at least one letter and at least one number.
The password must not contain a letter or a number used three or more times in a row.
You must enter the password correctly in two fields.

The online ID you entered cannot be used.
Please enter another online ID.
When entering an online ID, note the following:
You cannot use an online ID that is already taken.
The online ID must be 3 to 16 characters and can consist of letters, numbers, hyphens (-) and underscores (_).
The first character must be a letter.
The online ID must not be the same as your password.
You have entered an invalid character.
住民登録番号が正しくありません。
The account information that you entered is not for a master account.
The country or region information for the master account and the sub account must be the same.
The maximum number of sub accounts that can be associated with a master account has been reached. The maximum number you can associate with one master account is six.
The online name you entered cannot be used. Please enter another online name.
When entering an online name, note the following:
The online name must contain 3 to 16 characters.

The information you entered for [About Me] cannot be used.
Please enter different information.
This content is not available because of parental control restrictions.
The information you entered is not valid.

The e-mail address you entered cannot be used.
Please enter another e-mail address.

This content is available as a rental for %1 days. However, the content can only be played for %2 hours after first playback. For details, refer to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement.
About Us | Privacy Policy | Terms of Service
Terms of Service and User Agreement
Choose how you will fund your wallet.
The requested funds have been added to your wallet. Your wallet now contains %1.
Select the amount of funds to be added.
Do you want to add %1 to the wallet using your credit card (%2 %3)?
By selecting [Yes], you agree to fund the wallet in accordance with the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. Funds added to the wallet are non-refundable.
By selecting [Yes], you agree to fund the wallet in accordance with the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement.

Notice: To obtain the receipt by post, please contact our customer services at 0809 079 888 within 5 days from the funding date of your wallet, to confirm your postal address and receipt content. (Office Hour: Monday ‐ Sunday, 9:00 ‐ 20:00)
* This is the 3 or 4 digit code on your card.
Enter the billing address that is on file with your credit card company.
This PlayStation®Network Card has a value of %1. Do you want to add these funds to your wallet?
There are no avatars. You can purchase avatars from PlayStation®Store (PS3™).
This operation cannot be performed using your account (sub account).

The credit card information is not valid.
Please check your entries carefully.

You must enter a valid address.
Please check your entries carefully.

The credit card is no longer valid.
Please use a different credit card.

The credit card information cannot be updated.
Check your PlayStation®Network account information, and then contact technical support for assistance.

The code you entered may not be correct or may no longer be valid.
Please check your entries.

This PlayStation®Network Card number has already been used.
Please check your entries.
The funds could not be added to your wallet.
The funds cannot be added. The maximum funding amount would be exceeded.
The password is not valid. Please try again.

The credit card information on file is not valid.
Go to [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] and check the credit card information.
You cannot use PlayStation®Network with this account.
Select the method for resetting the password.
An e-mail message will be sent from PlayStation®Network to the following e-mail address:
Follow the instructions in the e-mail message to reset the password using a PC.
An e-mail message has been sent to "%1".

This operation cannot be performed using your account (sub account). You must ask the holder of the associated master account to perform this operation.
＜Note to parent or guardian＞ If you do not know the password for the sub account, use your master account to sign in, and then reset the sub account password by selecting [Sub Account Management] under [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management].
To sign in, you must accept the Terms of Service / User Agreement and Privacy Policy again.
